title: 自己做的插件启用时出错怎么解决求助
author: qq1423143194
txt_content:
报错代码是这条
    public void onEnable() {
            ConfigurationLoader.loadYamlConfiguration((Plugin)this, Settings.class, true);


写完后启用服务器插件出现的启动报错
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[19:58:21] [Server thread/INFO]: [CCCSSSD] Enabling CCCSSSD v1.1
[19:58:21] [Server thread/ERROR]: Error occurred while enabling CCCSSSD v1.1 (Is it up to date?)
org.yaml.snakeyaml.error.YAMLException: java.nio.charset.MalformedInputException: Input length = 1
        at org.yaml.snakeyaml.reader.StreamReader.update(StreamReader.java:200) ~[PaperSpigot.jar:git-Paper-1104]
        at org.yaml.snakeyaml.reader.StreamReader.<init>(StreamReader.java:60) ~[PaperSpigot.jar:git-Paper-1104]
        at org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml.loadAs(Yaml.java:444) ~[PaperSpigot.jar:git-Paper-1104]
        at com.**.STD.Config.ConfigurationLoader.loadYamlConfiguration(ConfigurationLoader.java:65) ~[?:?]
        at com.**.STD.ItemLorePlugin.onEnable(ItemLorePlugin.java:105) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin.setEnabled(JavaPlugin.java:271) ~[PaperSpigot.jar:git-Paper-1104]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader.enablePlugin(JavaPluginLoader.java:316) [PaperSpigot.jar:git-Paper-1104]
        at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.enablePlugin(SimplePluginManager.java:407) [PaperSpigot.jar:git-Paper-1104]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_11_R1.CraftServer.enablePlugin(CraftServer.java:378) [PaperSpigot.jar:git-Paper-1104]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_11_R1.CraftServer.enablePlugins(CraftServer.java:328) [PaperSpigot.jar:git-Paper-1104]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.MinecraftServer.t(MinecraftServer.java:438) [PaperSpigot.jar:git-Paper-1104]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.MinecraftServer.l(MinecraftServer.java:399) [PaperSpigot.jar:git-Paper-1104]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.MinecraftServer.a(MinecraftServer.java:337) [PaperSpigot.jar:git-Paper-1104]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.DedicatedServer.init(DedicatedServer.java:276) [PaperSpigot.jar:git-Paper-1104]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_11_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:612) [PaperSpigot.jar:git-Paper-1104]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_202]
Caused by: java.nio.charset.MalformedInputException: Input length = 1
        at java.nio.charset.CoderResult.throwException(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_202]
        at sun.nio.cs.StreamDecoder.implRead(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_202]
        at sun.nio.cs.StreamDecoder.read(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_202]
        at java.io.InputStreamReader.read(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_202]
        at org.yaml.snakeyaml.reader.UnicodeReader.read(UnicodeReader.java:123) ~[PaperSpigot.jar:git-Paper-1104]
        at java.io.Reader.read(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_202]
        at org.yaml.snakeyaml.reader.StreamReader.update(StreamReader.java:184) ~[PaperSpigot.jar:git-Paper-1104]
        ... 15 more
[19:58:21] [Server thread/INFO]: [CCCSSSD] Disabling CCCSSSD v1.1

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
如果我将
    public void onEnable() {
改成
    public void onenable() {
它就能成功启动但是输入插件的指令显示一个"/XXX ?"
然后就没回应了求助是怎么回事以前我这样写都没什么问题的
就这次写的这个插件报错了

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
配置文件编码改改
另外配置文件是否存在
